content: **knitted jacket in 1 strand drops nord and 2 strands drops kid-silk or 1 strand drops baby merino and 2 strands drops kid-silk piece is knitted top down with european yoke size xs xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #autumnnutmegcardigan drops design pattern no-099 yarn group a + a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops nord from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 200-250-250-300-300-350-350 g colour 22 chestnut and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 175-175-200-225-225-250-275 g colour 35 chocolate or use drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 200-250-250-300-300-350-350 g colour 52 chocolate and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 175-175-200-225-225-250-275 g colour 35 chocolate **buttons** drops button no 818 6-6-6-7-7-7-7 pieces **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 16 stitches in width and 20 row vertically in stocking stitch and 2 strands drops kid-silk and 1 strand drops nord or 2 strands drops kid-silk and 1 strand drops baby merino = 3 strands on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
